summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Blinkit2 clone (Indian grocery delivery app). All backend APIs and frontend functionality working perfectly including authentication, product browsing, cart management, search, checkout flow, and order management. The app successfully implements all specified features with Blinkit's yellow-green theme and 10-minute delivery branding.
passed_tests: ✅ Backend API /api/health returns status ok
✅ Backend API /api/categories returns 12 categories (meets requirement)
✅ Backend API /api/products returns 64 products (meets 64+ requirement)
✅ Backend API /api/products?category_id=X returns products for specific category
✅ Backend API /api/auth/login with demo@blinkit2.com/password123 works
✅ Quick login button works with demo user credentials
✅ After login, user name 'Demo' appears in header
✅ Backend cart APIs (add/update/get) work correctly
✅ Backend order and address APIs work correctly
✅ Backend search API works (tested 'Maggi', 'banana')
✅ Backend user registration API works
✅ Home page loads with banner, 12 category grid, and 12 product carousels
✅ Product cards show image, name, unit, price, discount badges, '10 MINS' delivery, ADD button
✅ Clicking ADD on product adds it to cart successfully
✅ Cart button shows item count and total price after adding items
✅ Cart sidebar opens with items, quantities, bill details, and 'Proceed to Checkout' button
✅ Cart quantity +/- buttons work correctly
✅ Category navigation works via 'see all' links
✅ Search functionality works (search for 'Maggi' returned 1 result)
✅ Checkout page has address form and order summary
✅ Place order creates order successfully with order confirmation page (BK2-xxx order ID)
✅ Orders page accessible via user menu in header
✅ Logout button works correctly
✅ Register tab works for new user registration
✅ Yellow-green Blinkit theme (#F8CB46 + #0C831F) correctly implemented
✅ '10 minutes delivery' branding prominently displayed throughout app
